label: Education
Mlstr_harmo::algorithm:
case_when(
      MUTBILD_0 == 1 & VATBILD_0 == 1 ~ 0L,
      MUTBILD_0 %in% c(2) | VATBILD_0 %in% c(2) ~ 1L,  
      MUTBILD_0 %in% c(3) | VATBILD_0 %in% c(3) ~ 2L, 
      MUTBILD_0 %in% c(4) | VATBILD_0 %in% c(4) ~ 3L, 
      MUTBILD_0 %in% c(5, 6) | VATBILD_0 %in% c(5, 6) ~ 4L, 
      MUTBILD_0 %in% c(7) | VATBILD_0 %in% c(7) ~ 5L,  
      TRUE ~ NA_integer_
    )
Mlstr_harmo::comment:
"None" (0): Both parents have 1 (no certificate).
"Primary School Completed" (1): Either parent has 2.
"Technical/Professional School" (2): Either parent has 3.
"Secondary School" (3): Either parent has 4.
"Longer Education" (4): Either parent has 5 or 6.
"Not Specified" (5): Either parent has 7 (other degree).

label: Employment
Mlstr_harmo::algorithm:
case_when(
      mutberuztak3_15 == 1 | vatberuztak3_15 == 1 ~ 1L,
      mutberuztak3_15 %in% 2:4 | vatberuztak3_15 %in% 2:4 ~ 2L,  
      mutberuztak3_15 == 5 & vatberuztak3_15 == 5 ~ 5L,
      is.na(mutberuztak3_15) & vatberuztak3_15 == 5 ~ 5L,
      is.na(vatberuztak3_15) & mutberuztak3_15 == 5 ~ 5L,
      is.na(mutberuztak3_15) & is.na(vatberuztak3_15) ~ 7L,
      TRUE ~ NA_integer_
    )
Mlstr_harmo::comment:
If either parent is "fully employed (100%)," assign 1L.
If either parent works "more than half day," "half day," or "less than half day," 
If both parents are "not at all employed," assign 5L.
If one parent's status is NA, use the other parent's status to determine the category.
If both are NA, assign 7L ("other").

label: Physical activity from questionnaire data [MET-hr/day]
Mlstr_harmo::comment: (1.5(average mean of light activities)+ 3(average mean of moderate actvities)+6(average mean of heavy activities)/7

Age at the first given birth [years]
Total cholesterol measured from blood samples [mmol/L]
LDL cholesterol measured from blood samples [mmol/L]
HDL cholesterol measured from blood samples [mmol/L]
First degree family history of premature CHD and stroke
First degree family history of T2D
Mlstr_harmo::algorithm:
case_when (
  diabmut_15 == 1 | diabvat_15 == 1 ~ 1L,
  diabmut_15 == 0 & diabvat_15 == 0 ~ 0L,
  (is.na(diabmut_15) | diabmut_15 == 3) & diabvat_15 == 0 ~ NA_integer_,
  (is.na(diabvat_15) | diabvat_15 == 3) & diabmut_15 == 0 ~ NA_integer_,
  (is.na(diabmut_15) | diabmut_15 == 3) & (is.na(diabvat_15) | diabvat_15 == 3) ~ NA_integer_, 
  TRUE ~ NA_integer_
)
Mlstr_harmo::comment:
If either parent has diabetes, the family history is marked as 1.
If both parents do not have diabetes, the family history is marked as 0.
If one parent's status is missing or unknown (NA or 3), use the other parent’s status. If the known parent has diabetes, the family history is marked as 1, and if the known parent does not have diabetes, the family history is marked as NA.
If both parents' statuses are missing -> "" or unknown -> 888, the family history is marked as NA (insufficient data).
